Deficiency Narrative: 1 child file reviewed did not have the required discharge documentation.
Correction Narrative: The Clinical Director will ensure that all Discharge Summaries are completed for each Discharge and that they are place in the child's file upon completion.  The Program Director/Executive Director will sign off on the discharge file ensuring that the Discharge Summary is completed and in the file before the file is broken down and stored away.
